= Introduction =

This page gives you an overview of what's new in BigBlueButton 0.71.  At the moment, you can try the latest version by using our [http://devbuild.bigbluebutton.org/ Development Build Server].

== Share region of your desktop ==

The share desktop button shows a preview window that enables you share your entire desktop (same as 0.70) or a selected region.

http://bigbluebutton.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/bbb-images/0-17-3.png

When you click 'Region', a Java applet will start and dragable selection area appears on your screen.  You can drag and resize it to select the area you want.

http://bigbluebutton.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/bbb-images/0-17-4.png
